p: Whey protein may also be applied to nanoencapsulate bioactive compounds such as oils because of its functional characteristics, such as its surface activity, gelation, shielding, and protective properties, e.g., biocompatibility and biodegradability [ 58]. Ricaurte et al. [ 10] applied HOPO and obtained nanocapsules with whey protein from microfluidization, confirming that this methodology was able to create stable nanocapsules with a diameter of 163Â nm.
